main - Static variable in class alethinophidia.game.R.layout
 
MainMenu - Class in alethinophidia.userInterface
Class that controls all Main Menu buttons

MapChoiceMenu - Class in alethinophidia.userInterface
The most complex of menus.

MapGrid - Class in alethinophidia.map
Responsible of drawing map on the screen, along with background image Also creates and holds MapReader instance
MapGrid(GameView, Bitmap, Bitmap, Context, String) - Constructor for class alethinophidia.map.MapGrid
 
MapReader - Class in alethinophidia.map
Basically it's a holder for the positions of all walls and starting snake location.
MapReader(Context, String) - Constructor for class alethinophidia.map.MapReader
 
MapThumb - Class in alethinophidia.map
Class used for creating small maps in MapChoiceMenu.

Main control center of in game menus (except for InGameInterface).

MessageWindow - Class in alethinophidia.userInterface
Class controls the popup that shows after the game is over
